alert.note: Alert for Livingston; Washtenaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 5:28PM EDT until June 25 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: The National Weather Service in Detroit/Pontiac has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Livingston County in southeastern Michigan... Washtenaw County in southeastern Michigan... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 528 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Jackson, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Chelsea and Gregory around 550 PM EDT. Pinckney around 555 PM EDT. Hamburg around 605 PM EDT. Brighton and Whitmore Lake around 610 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Pittsfield Township, Whittaker, Plainfield, Hudson Mills Metropark, Island Lake State Recreation Area, Bridgewater, Delhi Mills, Pleasant Lake, Barton Hills and Pinckney State Recreation Area. People attending Howell High School should seek safe shelter immediately! HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for southeastern Michigan. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for southeastern Michigan.
